parameters.name: NumOfComponent
parameters.description: Number of components in array specified by Component

parameters.name: Component
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of components VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: NumOfIntComponent
parameters.description: Number of interfering components in array returned by this method (see Remarks )

parameters.name: InterferingComponent
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of interfering components VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IInterferenceDetectionMgr.IGetComponentsTransformInterference
description: Calculates and gets the interfering components for the specified components and math transform.
signature:
System.Boolean IGetComponentsTransformInterference( 
   System.Int32
NumOfComponent
,
   ref Component2
Component
,
   ref MathTransform
Transform
,
   System.Int32
NumOfIntComponent
,
   out Component2
InterferingComponent
)

parameters.name: NumOfComponent
parameters.description: Number of components in array specified by Component

parameters.name: Component
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of components VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: NumOfIntComponent
parameters.description: Number of interfering components in array returned by this method (see Remarks )

parameters.name: InterferingComponent
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of interfering components VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IInterferenceDetectionMgr::GetComponentsTransformInterferenceCount
to populate NumOfIntComponent.
